objects.name: TrickBot Yara Rule
objects.description: This is an IoC for TrickBot
objects.pattern: [ yara-rule:value = 'rule MALW_mailsercher_trickbot_module : Trojan { meta: author = "Marc Salinas @Bondey_m" description = " Detects mailsearcher module from Trickbot Trojan" strings: $str_mails_01 = "mailsearcher" $str_mails_02 = "handler" $str_mails_03 = "conf" $str_mails_04 = "ctl" $str_mails_05 = "SetConf" $str_mails_06 = "file" $str_mails_07 = "needinfo" $str_mails_08 = "mailconf" condition: all of ($str_mails_*) }' ]
